title: How to Make Chocolate Peanut Butter Crispies

steps.headline: Combine the sugar and corn syrup in a Dutch oven.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the sugar dissolves and it begins to boil.
Remove from heat and add the peanut butter, stirring until smooth.
Gradually stir in cereal and peanuts.
Stir in chocolate mini-morsels, and press into a lightly greased jellyroll pan.
Let cool, and cut into 1 ⁄2 inch (3.8 cm) squares.

text: Combine the sugar and corn syrup in a Dutch oven.  Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the sugar dissolves and it begins to boil.  Remove from heat and add the peanut butter, stirring until smooth.  Gradually stir in cereal and peanuts.  Stir in chocolate mini-morsels, and press into a lightly greased jellyroll pan.  Let cool, and cut into 1 ⁄2 inch (3.8 cm) squares.  Serve and enjoy!
